subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} The side view of a [[dog]].

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*d-kʷəj-n||dog}}.

This common Sino-Tibetan word has been replaced by {{och-l|狗}} in most dialects except Min Dong, such as [[w:Fuzhou dialect|Fuzhou]] ''kēng''. In other dialects, this word is mainly found in compounds and not used alone.
